0x9970386F.name: GET_PED_DRAWABLE_VARIATION_COLLECTION_LOCAL_INDEX
0x9970386F.description: An analogue to [GET_PED_DRAWABLE_VARIATION](#\_0x67F3780DD425D4FC) that returns collection local drawable index (inside [GET_PED_DRAWABLE_VARIATION_COLLECTION_NAME](#\_0xBCE0AB63) collection) instead of the global drawable index.
0x9970386F.resultsDescription: Local drawable index of the drawable that is currently used in the given ped and component.
